title: Cute.
review: Don't really undrstand the low ratings. It's a romcom people, not Wuthering Heights. I thought it was cute, funny and light. Exactly what I was looking for.

title: difficult to watch
review: I wanted this to be an easy movie to watch and though it was simple indeed, i found myself cringing 75% of the time. characters and their story lines were wildly underdeveloped. the protagonist was extremely unlikeable and rude and hard to root for. i felt like i was missing major plot points but alas they just didn't exist... good thing it was predictable. not to mention, hasn't this exact movie already come out 8 time since the last year? save yourself and skip this one

title: Bad
review: I felt like watching a chick movie but this wasn´t a good romantic comedy. You don´t leave feeling uplifted or happy. It drags on at the end. A waste of time.
